channel.title: Making a command to increase heigh?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have my command "::shops" but I have a problem.
I found a cool area upstairs in a building but I need to know how to teleport to that height. I know to teleport to the coordinates are teleportToX ; and teleportToY = ;, but what about height?
someone please help

item.title: Making a command to increase heigh?
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:20, topic:522197”][quote author=mr dope link=topic=640704.msg4317402#msg4317402 date=1371713482]

It’s czar based Allstar so it should look like this:

if (command.equalIgnoreCase("up"))
{
                heightLevel += 1;
                teleportToX = absX;
                teleportToY = absY;
}

Did you not even look at any other previous reply?

I did, but I didn’t really need to. I assumed the source he needed help with was Allstar since his name is connected to an allstar server on moparscape’s server status checker page. Also, none of the other codes would of worked if it was indeed an allstar. So I don’t really get the point you’re trying to make.
[/quote]
The point that I was trying to make was that someone else already posted a command that only increased the height level as opposed to what the OP actually wanted which we clarified. If you read the previous posts, you would have known that.[/quote]

Ah, you’re right. That was my mistake. Height = 1 for the place above the shops (if it’s czar).

Read full topic
item.source: Making a command to increase heigh?

item.title: Making a command to increase heigh?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:14, topic:522197”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640704.msg4317025#msg4317025 date=1371668003]

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("goup")) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY());
			c.heightLevel += 1;
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("godown")) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY());
			c.heightLevel -= 1;
		}

Ripped from my server.
Convert if needed.
[/quote]I don’t think that’s what he was asking for thought he asked about how to make a ::shops command be able to go up a height level when teleporting that’s why I gave my old command code.[/quote]
Then he should really label the question better. “Making a command to increase height”
Oh well it gives enough that he could use shops correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a command to increase heigh?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:13, topic:522197”][code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“goup”)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY());
c.heightLevel += 1;
}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("godown")) {
		c.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY());
		c.heightLevel -= 1;
	}

[/code]

Ripped from my server.
Convert if needed.[/quote]I don’t think that’s what he was asking for thought he asked about how to make a ::shops command be able to go up a height level when teleporting that’s why I gave my old command code.

item.title: Making a command to increase heigh?
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

lol +10000 to the Y
The command LoveAndPower supplied you with will work but only in the set coordinates.
I imagine you’re wanting a command that increases the height anywhere… so use this:
if(c.playerRights == 0 && playerCommandEquals(“2ndfloor”){
c.playerHeight = 2;
or whatever revision you have depends on how you declare the height.
}

Read full topic

item.title: Making a command to increase heigh?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:4, topic:522197”]I think how you do that is by keeping the x coord but + 10000 to the y? Tell me if that works or not. I’ve seen a tutorial about this but I don’t know where it went.

and a revision and source would be very helpful[/quote]
A y coordinate doesn’t change the height, it shifts a player on the y-axis.

Read full topic
